sentences.en: Attacks were reported on police, vehicles and commercial premises.
sentences.cn: 据报道，警察、车辆和商业经营场所均遭到袭击。

sentences.en: Attention is drawn to a special voluntary course in Commercial French.
sentences.cn: 一门特别的商务法语选修课引起了大家的关注。

sentences.en: British Rail has indeed become more commercial over the past decade.
sentences.cn: 过去10年来，英国铁路确实变得更加商业化了。

sentences.en: Davies's writing is far too off-centre to be commercial.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯的作品由于太过怪诞而难以获得商业成功。

sentences.en: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

sentences.en: She studied painting from 1926 and also worked as a commercial artist.
sentences.cn: 她从1926年起开始学画，同时还从事着商业艺术家的工作。

sentences.en: Sport is being debased by commercial sponsorship.
sentences.cn: 体育运动因受商业赞助而降低了声誉。

sentences.en: the commercial heart of the city
the commercial hub of the city
The company laid off 65,000 workers after commercial-jet orders dried up.
sentences.cn: 商务飞机订单减少后公司精减了65,000名工人。

sentences.en: The film was a huge commercial success.
sentences.cn: 这部电影获利非常丰厚。

sentences.en: The land was not zoned for commercial purposes.
sentences.cn: 这块地未划作商业用地。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: They are taking a hard-headed commercial decision.
sentences.cn: 他们正在作出一项清醒冷静的商业决策。

sentences.en: They are the leading manufacturer in both defence and commercial products.
sentences.cn: 在军工产品和民用产品的制造方面，他们都处于领先地位。

sentences.en: They levied religious taxes on Christian commercial transactions.
sentences.cn: 他们对基督徒的商业交易征收宗教税。

sentences.en: Universities are turning from academic to commercial sponsorship.
sentences.cn: 各大学正从学术赞助转而寻求商业赞助。

words.tran_cn: 商业主义；营利主义；重商主义
使商品化；靠…赚钱（commercialize的过去分词）
贸易的,商业上的,营业性的

phrases.tran_cn: 商业银行；商业银行业务
商业大厦，商业楼宇；商业建筑物
商业发票，正式签证的贸易发票
n. 商业财产，商用不动产
市场价值；经济价值；出售价格

trans.tran_cn: 商业（化）的，营利的，商品化的，商用的
trans.tran_en: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services
an advertisement on television or radio
